title.native: とある科学の超電磁砲

description:
Academy City is a highly developed place in terms of technology. It is said to be 20 to 30 years ahead of the rest of the world, and 80% of its 2.3 million residents are students. The focus of studies here is directed towards esper powers. Misaka Mikoto, one of the top level espers in town, shares a room with Kuroko Shirai, another high level esper who is a member of Judgement, a law enforcing agency composed of students. Both attend Tokiwadai, a private school reserved for the high-leveled and the rich. Kuroko's partner at Judgement, Kazari Uiharu, is a low level esper who studies at Sakugawa middle school. Her best friend and classmate there is Ruiko Saten, a level zero, one who has no esper powers. Together, the four encounter several adventures in the exciting scientific town.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: เรลกัน แฟ้มลับคดีวิทยาศาสตร์

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Boarding School
tags.description: Features characters attending a boarding school.

tags.name: Superhero
tags.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Robots
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid machines.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Kaiju
tags.description: Prominently features giant monsters.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Gangs
tags.description: Centers around gang organizations.

tags.name: Police
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Super Robot
tags.description: Prominently features large robots often piloted by hot-blooded protagonists.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

node.description:
The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

[Official website](http://dengekibunko.jp/author/kamachikazuma/index.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kamachi_ka)

Kazuma Kamachi is a Japanese light novel author and the original creator of the Toaru Majutsu no Index light novel series and its spin-off manga series, Toaru Kagaku no Railgun and Toaru Kagaku no Accelerator.

As he uses a pen name, his real name and identity is as of yet unknown.

Before becoming the famous writer of the Index light novel series, Kamachi wrote a story entitled Schrödinger's City (シュレディンガーの街 Shuredingā no Machi?) as an entry in the  9th Dengeki Game Novel Prize; unfortunately, his submission failed to reach past the third selection stage of the said competition. However, his story caught the attention of the editor-in-chief of Dengeki, and Kamachi later became in-charge in writing the book Kaite-minai ka? (書いてみないか？? lit., Want to Try Writing?), which became his debut as a professional writer.

Kamachi began writing novels while he was still studying as a junior high school student. However, his works were not finished until he graduated from high school.
[Website](http://r-s.sakura.ne.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/haimurakiyotaka) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=164728) | [Pawoo](https://pawoo.net/@2075642)

__Agency:__ Smile Company (2007-2020)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ELISA_0414) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/elisa_0414/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/elisa.smile.official)__

ＥＬＩＳＡ (エリサ) is a Japanese pop singer and model of elite model management Japan. She debuted with the single, 「 euphoric field feat. ELISA 」.  She knew the pleasure of singing by joined a choir at the age of a seventh grader then played piano from 3 years old. At the age of a ninth grader, she participated in the national choir convention. At the age of a tenth grader, she joined and played opera. Her favorite opera is “The Marriage of Figaro” of Mozart.  She applied for model audition “elite Model Look 2007” to try her possibility at the age of an eleventh grader. The 10 finalists will be elected to the National Convention.  The opera which she sang at the time of audition serves as a major debut in October of the year by an opportunity.  Her debut single is 「euphoric field feat.ELISA 」 (TV Anime “ef-a tale of memories” opening theme) records the 22nd place on ORICON chart at first appearance and a longtime seller becomes it afterwards and records an exceptional world-beater more than 30,000 pieces as a rookie.  She released 2nd single 「HIKARI 」 (TV Anime “Nabari no Ou” ending theme) in May, 2008 and strengthened presence as the singer in a contrastive ballad song with the debut at a stretch. Furthermore, She appeared in “2008 Animelo Summer Live -Challenge-” in August, 2008 and overwhelm about 18,000 people.
In September 2020, Elisa allegedly suffered sexual harassment from her manager. She has terminated her contract with Smile Company.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

He made his full directorial debut with the release of [Honey and Clover II](https://anilist.co/anime/1142/Hachimitsu-to-Clover-II/) in 2006, after which he directed [Idolmaster: Xenoglossia](https://anilist.co/anime/1694/Idolmster-Xenoglossia/) in 2007, and [Toradora!](https://anilist.co/anime/4224/Toradora/) in 2008. He has also directed the spin-off series of [Toaru Majutsu no Index](https://anilist.co/anime/4654/Toaru-Majutsu-no-Index/), respectively named [Toaru Kagaku no Railgun](https://anilist.co/anime/6213/Toaru-Kagaku-no-Railgun/), which released in 2009.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [mangaka](https://anilist.co/staff/245226/Yuuichi-Tanaka)._
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/水上清資)

fripSide is a Japanese indie pop band. Started in 2002. They also have many other support members.  

On March 15, 2009, nao stated on the fripSide Official Website that she had graduated from fripSide. Sat and nao want to pursue different musical careers, as nao intends to pursue a solo singing career. Meanwhile Sat will continue in fripSide with a new project called, fripside: THE NEXT PROJECT. Seiyuu Yoshino Nanjo took over as the vocalist of fripSide with her debut single "only my railgun", the opening of the anime, To Aru Kagaku no Railgun. 

(Source: Wikipedia)

__Members__
- sat - [Satoshi Yaginuma](https://anilist.co/staff/111757) (八木沼悟志) - (lyrics, synthesizers, composer, arrangement) (2002-present)
- Mao Uesugi (上杉真央) - (vocals) (2022-present)
- Hisayo Abe (阿部寿世) - (vocals) (2022-present)

__Former Members__
- [nao](https://anilist.co/staff/118365/nao) (vocal, lyrics) (2002-2009)
- [Yoshino Nanjo](https://anilist.co/staff/96592/Yoshino-Nanjo) (南條愛乃) - (vocals, lyrics) (2009-2022)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/zachbolton6)

Also a line producer.

Well-known members: KOTOKO (Shakugan no Shana, Hayate no Gotoku, Kannaduki no Miko) Mami Kawada (Shakugan no Shana, To Aru Majutsu no Index) Lia (AIR, Angel Beats, Clannad)  Eiko Shimamiya (Higurashi no Naku Koro ni) Mell (Black Lagoon, Rideback, Highschool Of The Dead)

Twitter __Satoshi Yaginuma__ is a Japanese musician, composer, arranger, lyricist, music producer, synthesizer keyboarder, and guitarist. He is part of the pop duo fripSide and the hip-hop/synthpop trio ALTIMA. He is also the CEO of p.m.works, Inc.

Twitter __Satoshi Yaginuma__ is a Japanese musician, composer, arranger, lyricist, music producer, synthesizer keyboarder, and guitarist. He is part of the pop duo fripSide and the hip-hop/synthpop trio ALTIMA. He is also the CEO of p.m.works, Inc.

Twitter __Satoshi Yaginuma__ is a Japanese musician, composer, arranger, lyricist, music producer, synthesizer keyboarder, and guitarist. He is part of the pop duo fripSide and the hip-hop/synthpop trio ALTIMA. He is also the CEO of p.m.works, Inc.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/濱野高年)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule.

Originating from Studio Boomerang, currently affiliated with [ufotable](https://anilist.co/studio/43/). 

His role as a main animator on [Ikki Tousen: Dragon Destiny](https://anilist.co/anime/1956/) attracted a lot of attention. At ufotable he is one of the studio's key members among people like [Akira Matsushima](https://anilist.co/staff/119808/), [Masayuki Kunihiro](https://anilist.co/staff/146702/) and [Masaru Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/146698/).

Held in high regard by [Yasuomi Umetsu](https://anilist.co/staff/101583/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nyorock1)

Originating from [J.C. Staff](https://anilist.co/studio/7/).

Affiliated with [WIT Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/).
[Blog](https://www2p.biglobe.ne.jp/~s-hf/works.htm)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/松倉友二)

Affiliated with [J.C. Staff](https://anilist.co/studio/7/) since 1992, where he currently serves as the Executive Officer and General Manager of Production Headquarters. Also the representative director of Jam Creation.
